name: High Elf
description: Elves with a natural inclination for magic and an affinity for the arcane arts.

Elf Weapon Training (High Elf).description: You have proficiency with the longsword, shortsword, shortbow, and longbow.

Cantrip (High Elf).description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

Extra Language (High Elf).description: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choice.
